item.title: Color mystery in famous Jackson Pollock painting finally solved
item.description: Scientists have identified the origins of the blue color in one of Jackson Pollock's paintings with a little help from chemistry.

item.title: Israel's military says Gaza City ground offensive is underway
item.description: Israel's military says troops have "begun pushing into the heart of Gaza City," renewing its call for thousands of war-weary civilians to evacuate.

item.title: Trump sues New York Times for $15 billion for alleged "defamation and libel"
item.description: President Trump is suing The New York Times for $15 billion for what he says is a years-long pattern of defamation and libel by the paper against him.

item.title: 9/15: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Suspect in Charlie Kirk shooting is not cooperating, Utah governor says; Oklahoma Cityâ€™s GOP mayor makes the case for diversity.

item.title: Will the Fed cut rates this week? These charts may determine its decision.
item.description: With the U.S. economy facing headwinds, the Federal Reserve faces pressure to trim interest rates this week for the first time since December 2024.
